Html:
Just noticed this while I was skimming the code, but I'm unfortunately on a deadline and don't have time to figure out how to submit a patch, so apologies for being lazy --

Seems like the line:

            this.WeeksInterval = 1;

in the constructor for WeeklyTrigger should read:

            this.WeeksInterval = weeksInterval;
Thanks for finding this bug. It has been fixed and posted in source drop 56462.
